description: This file implements polyfills and management for custom elements, mutation observers, and web component features, including registration, upgrade, and DOM mutation handling for web components.

classes.name: WeakMap
classes.description: Polyfill for WeakMap if not natively available, providing set, get, delete, and has methods.

classes.name: JsMutationObserver
classes.description: A polyfill for MutationObserver, providing observe, disconnect, and takeRecords methods for DOM mutation tracking.

classes.name: MutationRecord
classes.description: Represents information about a DOM mutation event.

classes.name: Registration
classes.description: Handles registration of mutation observers for DOM nodes, managing event listeners and callback enqueuing.

methods.name: scheduleCallback
methods.description: Schedules mutation observer callbacks to be executed.

methods.name: dispatchCallbacks
methods.description: Dispatches all scheduled mutation observer callbacks.

methods.name: wrapIfNeeded
methods.description: Wraps a DOM node with ShadowDOMPolyfill if needed.

methods.name: forEachAncestorAndObserverEnqueueRecord
methods.description: Enqueues mutation records for ancestor nodes based on observer options.

methods.name: upgrade
methods.description: Upgrades a DOM node to a custom element if applicable.

methods.name: upgradeWithDefinition
methods.description: Upgrades a DOM element with a specific custom element definition.

methods.name: implementPrototype
methods.description: Sets the prototype of a custom element, either via __proto__ or mixin.

methods.name: created
methods.description: Calls createdCallback on a custom element if defined.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new custom element with the document.

methods.name: upgradeDocumentTree
methods.description: Upgrades all elements in a document tree.

methods.name: upgradeAll
methods.description: Upgrades all elements in a document.

methods.name: takeRecords
methods.description: Retrieves mutation records from the observer.
